case.state: W-why is your thing already out?! Did you forget to get dressed?!
Have you no shame, ~player~? Uhh... I guess not...
W-well, um, points for fearless, ~player~.
Mia! You're here, too?
Hey, Mia! I'm just as surprised as you!
Oh, Mia!
I've never gotten the chance to be in a hot spring with all my running around. I'll enjoy it, even though it's really steamy here...
It's pretty hot! So this is what being at the beach is like! Back when I was dragged though the Lamakan Desert, I didn't really get to take it in.
Whew... We're playing on the beach? Maybe I should have worn less...
Umm... Am I in there right place? A forest filled with ghosts is a little...
Will... we have to keep quiet as we play? Because I really doubt this is a silent game...
Wow, so many books I haven't read! Perfect, I can play, then read up to my heart's content!
How grandiose...
So, does the winner sit on the throne afterwards?
Ooh, an armory! I wonder if there's anything I can use in here...
My sword's pretty good, but I should probably check to see if there are any hidden treasures in here...
I feel so serene with such a beautiful lake here...
I feel I could just close my eyes and be at peace with nature.
Seeing a pool, maybe I should have put on less... But then I'd have a smaller chance of winning.
Glad to see some water here... This isn't the coolest place I've been...
Was... was all this setup so w-we'd get intimate after the game? Umm...
We haven't even started, but this background has my heart pounding already...
Is this a kind of celebration? It's certainly brightening my spirits!
So let's see... we play cards, and whoever loses each round takes off a piece of clothing? And we just keep doing that until we're out? Got it!
I don't think this is a game where I can be kept in the dark this time! I'm ready, so let's do this!
I never had the chance to play a game of cards before, but this should be pretty fun, right?
Mia! It's been a while!
I didn't expect to see you here after all this time, Mia!
Long time no see!
So elegant... M-my name is Jenna, Estelle. I'm looking forward to this as well.
Thank you, Estelle. I was a little worried about the kinds of characters I'd see in coming here, but it's nice to see someone as courteous as you!
I'm Jenna, Estelle. We should be thanking you for playing with us!
The pleasure is mine, Estelle. Let's all do our best!
I feel much better to meet someone as beautiful and gentle as you, Estelle! Good luck!
Are you sure you're allowed to play, Nugi-chan?
Maybe do that before joining, Nugi-chan...
Uh, are two people allowed to share a hand? ...They're always together? Well, if there's no objections, then good luck!
It's nice seeing a friendly face here.
I feel much more at ease knowing you're here with me, Mia.
This... isn't going to make things awkward for us afterward, right, Mia?
I feel as though I've been to a village that talked like you, Gloria. Where was it...?
At least I can jump in when this is all over... I'm burning up...
If we're playing outside in this heat, stripping is probably a good idea. Having this much on me, I'll start sweating quickly.
I may adept with fire, but that doesn't prevent me sweating from the heat... Whew...
Does that have to be your name? Fine, but try to take me hostage and I will turn you to ash.
Does that have to be your name? Fine, but try to take me hostage and I will turn you to ash.
These ghosts try anything and I'll make them wish they moved on.
Where should I start...? Oh, right, with this game! Sorry, I'm Jenna.

(Where is the history section...)
Oh, it's starting!
Somehow I feel like more than my clothes are on the line in this room...
For the glory of the kingdom! ...Uh, it felt like that should be said, is all. Hehe...
Does anyone mind if I look around after the game? I'm curious to see what else is in here.
Let's try to be careful not to knock anything over while we're in here, okay? Good. Best of luck!
Maybe I could go for a dip when the game's done.
I feel a lot more relaxed... Alright, let's play.
I'll be sure to bring something to dry off next time. Here we go!
I could practice my swimming... But let's play first!
My heart might need a minute...
I feel almost compelled to... fall in love right now...
Let's all make merry tonight!
This... isn't going to make things awkward for us afterward... right?
Having a familiar face playing the game makes me feel much more comfortable.
Only us three? Well, this won't be as embarrassing as a full table.
With just the three of us, there'll be a better focus on conversation, rather than everyone talking over on another.
Strip poker, huh? I've never played this, but it's something else I can experience now.
Don't go easy on me, okay?
I never had the chance to play cards, let alone strip poker before. That's no reason to hold back against me.
Is there anything else I need to know? No? Alright then, let's get started.
Let's get down to it, shall we? Good luck to each of you, and may the best one, uh, not lose...?
Time to begin? Let's have fun, everyone!
Set position of pose maker assets to 0
Can I keep what I have?
Is there anything that says I have to swap cards?
Oooh! These are all really good!
No swapping for me!
I don't need to swap any, Dealer!
Hard to beat this kind of luck!
I'd like to trade all of these in.
A new hand altogether would be good this time around.
Full swap, Dealer. I hope you all have better luck than me.
This hand as a whole probably won't keep me from losing.
So, I trade these ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifPlural(cards|card)~ in?
I don't think I'll need these ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifPlural(cards|card)~ for a better hand.
May I give ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifPlural(cards|card)~ to you, Dealer?
Uh... Maybe a better hand after my swap?
Right. Hopefully this will work out better...
I'll take ~cards.text~, please.
I need to get a better set of cards.
Some good luck would be nice right now...
Trade for ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifPlural(cards|card)~, Dealer?
I need this one to go in my favor!
I've got to hope for better!
I'd like ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifPlural(cards|card)~.
Only thing I can do is learn and do better.
Hmm... these ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifPlural(cards|card)~, perhaps?
I need luck to favor me now...
I've got it down now. I'll trade ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifPlural(cards|card)~.
Swapping these ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifPlural(cards|card)~ looks like my best option right now.
Uhmm... these ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifPlural(cards|card)~, if you'd please.
I could use some help... ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifPlural(cards|card)~ cards.
I'm trading ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifPlural(cards|card)~ in. Okay, Dealer?
~Cards.text~ ~cards.ifPlural(cards|card)~? I think... yeah, ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifPlural(cards|card)~.
I've got to play even better now... So, I'll trade ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifPlural(cards|card)~.
I need this hand to swing in my favor...!
Now's a good time for some consecutive wins!
~Cards.text~ ~cards.ifPlural(cards|card)~.... Dealer?
Yes! Ah, I hope you all have good hands too!
I'm glad this worked out for me!
Forgive me, everyone, but I don't think I'll be losing this round.
Even if it seems it won't get better, believe me when I say that I know it will.
Alright! Some good luck for me!
I may be new to card games, but I'm pretty sure this is a really good hand! Maybe you'll have this kind of luck next round!
It's not every day I'm this lucky! Perhaps my luck will spread around to all of you!
Yes! Just what I needed!
Hopefully the people of Vale are doing better after everything that's happened.
Maybe you can all be as lucky this time around too?
Alright!
(I wonder if Issac is helping his mother fix up their house again right now?)
This is starting to get more intense and personal as we go, huh?
(Despite all we've been through, Garet is probably training again. As if he's not strong enough already, hehe.)
Unfortunately for all of you, I don't think I'll be losing anything else this time around.
(Wonder what my brother's up to. He's not very talkative, and being secretive is kind of his strong suit.)
This should be good enough... I hope...
This hand should be enough to pull me through this round.
Is this enough? Oh, yes! It is!
Whew...
I know you w-want me to lose again right about now, but this hand should keep me safe.
Yes! And in the nick of time, too!
Sorry, but this hand will keep me from losing again.
If you really want me to lose this time, you'll need a really good hand yourself.
It's down to you and me. I'm not giving up, and neither should you!
I may be behind in this one on one, but I still plan on winning!
(Not much to say about this hand.)
I don't need to have the best hand, just not the worst hand.
It's best not to let my emotions show.
(This doesn't look like an ideal hand, but it should be enough.)
Perhaps you all fared better than this hand...
This is pretty nice, all things considered. Much better than being dragged around the world without even the chance to enjoy seeing it all.
I'm ready for the reveal. Are you?
Taking this one hand at time is pretty relaxing and fun, after all the running around we went through a couple years ago.
What makes this fun is that win or lose, we can enjoy the result regardless. That's how things should be.
My Psynegy may not give me any advantage, but at least that puts us all on an even playing field.
No fighting, just playing cards. Isn't this wonderful?
If your hands get cold or stiff, let me know. A little fire psynergy will warm your hands right up!
Everyone doing alright so far?
(Hopefully the villagers will do alright without me while I'm gone. Issac and Garet are there, so they should be able to handle anything out of the ordinary.)
Nothing like a friendly, um, strip card game to get to know one another, right?
Hmm...
I-I'd m-much prefer something better right about now...
It's feeling... a little breezy...
(Now might be a good time for a little fire to keep myself warm and relaxed...)
This game's really heating up now, huh? (And so am I...)
As much as want all of your hands to be good, I wouldn't mind something a little better than what I have.
This is still pretty fun. Playing a game like this is a whole new kind of exciting!
Uhh... This is...
Compared to being kept in the dark, having it all out in the open really is calming and enjoyable.
There's no second trade-in, right? Aww...
I hope the others are doing better than I am with this hand.
Well, I've been through worse...
Well, this isn't good for me. But on the other hand, everyone else has better chance of winning.
It's just one hand, no big deal.
Umm... Am I allowed to ask for my old cards back?
A loss for me is victory for everyone else, and that's what matters.
Can I borrow someone else's luck?
This beats being a hostage for so long, at least...
This... isn't very good. But at least that probably means everyone got good cards instead.
U-uhhh...
(I'd need someone else to have even worse luck than me to avoid losing this one. Though, I shouldn't hope for that.
T-this can't be...
Well, I am new to this, so probably more likely I'll lose than those who have experience.
This is getting to be really embarrassing... And I think I'm about to be even more embarrassed.
Not now of all times.
You're lucky you're got Ice Psynergy, Mia... Any chance we can trade Djinn? This heat is really getting to me too.
That big?! Who knows what else lies in the depths of the ocean?
Aww! I'm happy to see the two of you get along so well!
Making new friends even these situations... You're amazing, Mia.
To have grown so close with a stranger, Mia... We have a game of strip poker to thank for it. Crazy, isn't it?
That's... certainly impressive, Megumin. My Psynergy powers are nothing to sneeze at, but to defeat thousands...
I... think it looks very... sexy, Sucrose...
I didn't realize underwear could be so... provacative.
Whoa... It certainly gives you a more alluring look, Sucrose... And the fact that you were wearing that underneath...
Do you need some help with your cloak, Cagliostro?
(It's best that I'm silent while she prays. After our conflict with the Wise One, I'm not sure what faith to believe in.)
(She's so pure and full of faith... How wonderful.)
It... was tough to tell... Anything we encountered while we went up the lighthouse were obliterated by Saturos and Merandi without mercy.
I wasn't lucky enough to enjoy such a trip when I was held hostage, unfortunately. Hopeful I'll get to experience it properly this time!
I admit you do make a good point, but it doesn't really stop them from being any less annoying when you see them. Still, I'll try to be careful in the future.
That's fine, provided none of them try to crawl on me.
Even spiders need a place to live after all. Besides, they're probably more scared of us than we are of them... I-if you're scared of them, of course.
Can't say that I do, Fluttershy. That goes for my friends and family. We're just too busy anymore.
I heard in my travels that a lot of unusual characters came to the Inventory. Since I'm traveling to learn more about almost anything, I couldn't pass this up!
I-it's alright, Komi-san! You don't need to... ah, too late. The next hand's starting.
Don't feel rushed, Komi-san! You can- ah, maybe not...

Prioritizing is usually the best thing to do, but I personally try to think about what I want to happen sooner. Like, if I finish my training now, I can go help Isaac and Garet with the repairs later.
I've studied many books on Psynergy and Alchemy to better myself.
I haven't read many books outside of those for Psynergy and its history, but I am looking to see if there's anything else that catches my interest in my travels.
I'll have to try reading some of those books myself, Estelle.
Magic must be to you what Psynergy is me. To create elemental phenomena.
So your Keyblade works like a catalyst for your magic. Just as my staff does for me.
Nice to meet you, Nami!
A navigator? As in, someone who gives the course when sailing a ship? I'd love to hear about all the places you've been!
Nami, what kind of site have you seen as a navigator?! I'm dying to know!
Hmm... I think I could win a "destructive fire" contest... But I'd never do something like that! Unless there was an enemy we absolute have to defeat, of course.
An Augma? What kind of technology is that?
What does that little device do, Asuna?
Uh, should your... Augma, right? Should that not have been on?
I don't know if they'd interest you a lot, but perhaps the history of Weyard would interest you?
Not lately, but I'm on a bit of a knowledge hunt in my travels, Yuri. No telling what I'll learn now that I'm free to travel!
Well, would any books on the powers I can use, Psynergy, interest you, Yuri?
M-my dreams...?! W-well, I, um...
(My dreams... When I do dream, Isaac is usually there, with me...)
I like my body just the way it is, thank you very much.
I like how I look, and I wouldn't change anything about it.
Good idea, Caitlin!
Nice to meet you, Sucrose! I hope we both enjoy ourselves while we're here! I'm Jenna!
My name's Jenna, Sucrose! It's a pleasure to meet you!
I'm Jenna! Let's do our best, Sucrose!
Ah, yeah. Definitely don't want anyone underage seeing this... Is this girl your little sister?
This isn't something little girls should see or play... What's her relation to you though, Asuna?
Bad dreams... That would be... reliving the day... that I thought I lost my family.
Losing my friends... or my family... I've had those dreams before.
Now I know not to, Hu Tao. You're full of surprises!
I'll have to keep on toes around you, Hu Tao. Or maybe I won't, if I want to be surprised.
I... wow, I didn't realize how wrong I was. Sorry about that, Hu Tao.
Does being kidnapped and dragged around the world so my friends would chase me count as a cool story?
We managed to defeat a lot of powerful monsters while we were trying to save the world... Would any of those encounters work?
I come from the world of Weyard, Beatrix. A land filled with the power of Psynergy, and made of the four elements. But, wait... Planets?! There are more worlds beyond the sky?!
We, thankfully, don't need a kind of procedure needed on our bodies, Beatrix. If there is any kind of wound, the right Psynergy can patch us up easily.
Good question, Adrien. I might have to look into that myself afterwards.
It's certainly not through the powers of Psynergy that runs the Inventory. I wish I had more to information, Adrien.
I can't say I know how to play any instruments. I spend most of my time traveling, studying, and training.
Wait, are you able to talk to birds, Fluttershy?
Unfortunately, no. I ate before coming here. Thinking about it now, I should have brought some nuts or something.
His name is Data? Certainly an interesting name... I haven't seen him around, but I'll keep my eyes open for him.
A monkey that's a robot? Now I've seen everything... when and if I see him, at least.
Maria, I don't talking down to others is going to make you any friends.
Wha-! Maria, don't talk down to him like that.
Maybe men have wronged you, Maria. But that's no reason to take it out on any other man you see.
Don't take her talking to you like that! Stand up for yourself!
(Here's hoping the men here don't like being berated like this...)
I'd certainly like to more about the Inventory. So many mysteries surrounding it...
Teyvat? Yet another land I haven't been to yet... But yes, studying Alchemy is something I've been doing some years now. There's still so much we don't know about it...
I haven't met any mermaids, Arle, but I have run into sirens and similar creatures. They're not very friendly when others step on their turf...
While I still don't appreciate your attitude, I'd certainly like to hear more about where you come from, Cagliostro.
If it makes you more comfortable, I'll do that, Cheryl.
I'm sure you have your reasons, Cheryl.
I... don't think I'll be of any help here, Sucrose...
Uh... I'm not very experienced in those myself, Sucrose...
You're an alchemist, Sucrose? Wait, does that mean you know of the ancient of Weyard?! Of our land?!
You... run a funeral parlor, Hu Tao? I... uh... can't say that's the most exciting job, but what else does it entail?
(To have so much energy and to be so whimsical... how does she do it?)
I feel like there's never a dull moment with you around, Hu Tao.
Seeing you hair down like this is a whole new look for you, Ringo...
Nonon, what kind of school do you attend, exactly?
You certainly look the part of leader, Nonon...
Your baton wouldn't happen to be used in any kind of conduction, would it, Nonon? My staff helps me use my Psynergy better, so I wondered if it was the same.
It looks like your uniform grants you some kind of power, Nonon... It's similar to the gear I found in my previous journey!
Is there any kind of music in particular you like making, Nonon?
What kind of experiments do you do, Sucrose? Is... um... playing this game one of them?
What more can you tell me about your world's Alchemy, Sucrose?
It seems you're something of a Wind Adept, Sucrose... Wait, does that mean you can read minds?
If you can control the wind, Sucrose, does that mean you can also create lightning?
What kind of control of the wind do you possess, Sucrose?
I come from the village of Vale, which lies in the center of our world, Weyard. It's a calm and peaceful village where everyone gets along and has fun.
My home, Vale, is also home to the Sol Sanctum, where Psynergy, and Alchemy, the ancient form of Psynergy, were founded.
Psynergy is a power that exists throughout Weyard, though, until recently, most of the world didn't know that's what it was called. Some called it Chi, others believed it was magic!
Psynergy mainly consists of the four elements: Fire, Water, Wind, and Earth. Though there are other powers that don't fall into those categories as well.
I studied alongside my childhood friends, Isaac and Garet, to learn Psynergy. Though, I focused my efforts on destructive Psynergy, so that I could protect those close to me.
Overall, I think Psynergy is an amazing power! I feel truly special to know that I'm one of the few that can use it.
While Psynergy is a great power, it ultimately depends on who uses it... and how they do.

In terms of other powers, we can move things with our minds, pull things to the user, lift heavy objects, and even read minds! But, since my element is mainly fire, its usually only good for fighting boosting others.
You look like you belong to a school of some kind, ~ddlc~... Where do you come from?
What kind of uniform is that, ~ddlc~? Where did you come from?
Hey! Your hair stands up like mine, ~ahoge~! I hope we get along!
Your hair does that too, ~ahoge~? I have a feeling we'll get along just fine!
You look like you've been around, ~adventurer~? Do you like to travel as well?
You strike me as the type of person who has seen a lot, ~adventurer~? Where did you come from?
Wow, ~athlete~... You certainlu look in shape...
~athlete~... You... do your best to take of yourself, huh?
(~bounty_hunter~ looks like they're out to get someone... I'd better be careful not to get caught in the crossfire.)
Sooo... umm... ~bounty_hunter~, anyone in particular your seeking out at this particular establishment?
If someone here's done some kind of wrong, ~bounty_hunter~ let me know. I'll help you take them down.
Something doesn't seem right about ~AprilFools~... I'd better keep my guard up...
Uhh... you okay there, ~AprilFools~?
~AprilFools~, What's the matter with you?!
The power that's coming off of~magical_girl~... It's not Psynergy, but something else.
It's not Psynergy that ~magical_girl~ is using... What is she?
I'd didn't think I'd meet royalty here! It's a pleasure to meet you, ~princess~.
(If ~princess~ is royalty, I'd better be on my best behavior... If that's possible in this game...)
I'm Jenna! Oh... I mean, it's a honor to meet you, ~princess~.
I don't think we'll need any healing, ~cleric~, but it's reassuring to have you here, regardless.
Being close to someone who can mend wounds always sets my heart at ease, ~cleric~.
While we won't be needing to heal any physical wounds, ~cleric~, someone's pride may end up hurt by the end of this...
Hey, ~gambler~, would you mind coming with me to Tolbi sometime? I feel like we could win big!
Tolbi's a pretty popular gaming town, ~gambler~. You look like you'd enjoy yourself in such a place.
~Fighter~, do you mind if we spar after this is over? I'm curious to see how my training holds up.
You look like you can take care of yourself in a fight, ~fighter~...
Would you like to join me after this is over on my journey, ~fighter~? I wouldn't mind some backup!
Do us both a favor, ~creepy~, and stay far away from me.
If you don't want to get burned, ~creepy~, don't try anything funny.
(Why did I end up at a table with ~creepy~? I'm getting unnerved just by being close to them.)
~Psychic~ can also use their mind as power?! And yet, I don't feel any elemental power...
(How is ~psychic~...?! Are they also an Adept?!)
The power coming off of ~psychic~... Psynergy?!
Don't try to pull anything while you're here, ~delinquent~.
You strike me as the kind to cause trouble, ~delinquent~. See to it that you don't so I don't have to use my Psynergy.
Any ideas to brighten up my outfit, ~fashionable~? I'd love to look as stylish as you do!
(I ought to ask ~fashionable~ for some advice on making myself look better after the game.)
Hey, ~fashionable~! I'd love some fashion advice, if you're willing to share!
You being shy is making me feel shy, ~shy~... Let's both remember to enjoy ourselves, alright?
We're in this together, ~shy~. There's no need to feel timid.
Strip poker might be a lot for you to handle, ~shy~. But coming here and playing is very brave in it of itself!
Umm... How are you going to play if you can't see, ~blind~?
(I guess ~blind~ has a means of seeing their cards, though I can't fathom it...)
Do us all of favor, ~mean~, and keep your comments to yourself. I don't appreciate being talked down to.
If you don't intend on getting along with us, ~mean~, then at the very least, try to stay quiet.
Strange... ~Ninja~, you wouldn't happen to know how to use Wind Psynergy, would you?
So, ~ninja~, are you stealthy by title? Or by your skills? Or is it something else?
It's fair to warn you, ~thief~, that me and my friends have caught our fair share of bandits! So, if you try to take anything, you'll be sorry!
I'd suggest not trying to take anything, ~thief~, unless you'd like to be set on fire...
Vale may be gone now, but what's important is that we all survived. Including my family...
After being dragged around the world as a hostage, it's so nice to be able to go try all the things I missed out on!
I'll need to try to visit some of the cities like Tolbi, and enjoy the festivities while I'm out and about now.
A whole new view of the world is out there. I can't wait to see it all.
I don't think most of my Psynergy would help any repairs or construction anyway. Most of it is made for fighting. I need to think of other ways to help!
I keep my Djinn with me just in case, but I don't think I'll need them for a card game.
Djinn are pure elemental beings that can enhance a Psynergy user, an Adept's power. I keep mostly Mars Psynergy with me to further enhance my firepower.
I've taken good care of that scarf ever since I believed my mother died. Still, after finding out she was alive many years later, I still treasure it to this day.
I specialize in Fire Psynergy, which is mainly for attacking... it's, umm... not good for much else, unfortunately.
My Psynergy can also be used to boost the strength of my allies! It's temporary, but it's helped my brother and everyone else though some tough fights we've had.
While fighting can be... "exhilirating", as my teacher, Kraden, said, I'd prefer not to use it if I can help it. I don't like hurting others.
I try not to use Psynergy other than for self-defense. I once had to defeat some soldiers that were trying to stop us, and I had to hold back as much as I could so I didn't seriously hurt them.
Unfortunately, most of my Psynergy is only good for fighting. Maybe I should focus on Psynergy that can move or lift objects instead...
The best my Psynergy can do besides fighting is making campfires. At least, without the help of cetain relics...
My Psynergy is pretty powerful, though! If I'm fast enough to use it, most monsters are defeated with one attack! I just need to be careful that I don't overexert myself.
While my Psynergy is capable of defeating most enemies, I need to be careful I don't use it too much. I'll need to not use it for a while if I use it too much.
W-well, I, umm... Th-thank you, Yuno. That makes it feel worth it.
Yeah, I could start a fire with it! It's... one of the few things Fire Psynergy is good for outside of battle.
Starting a fire is one of the first things to learn when studying Psynergy. It's one of the non-fighting uses for it, Nadeshiko.
It's certainly much safer and more fun to travel in a group, but I've gotten strong enough to take care of myself now. Still, it gets a little lonely here and there.
A group is definitely the way to go when traveling! Though, I'd make sure... you've got some friends if you intend to travel as much as I have.
Different people have different... affinities for the four elements of Psynergy, Meia. Each person is born with an innate elemental affinity, and mine is fire.
Adepts refer to those who can wield Psynergy. Whether you're suited to fire, earth, water, or wind is based on element you have the most affinity to.
Uh, yeah, Jura! Depending on situation. I'm also pretty good a wield staves to enhance my Psynergy even further.
Th-thank you for the compliment, Jura. Being versatile in battle has helped out a lot depending on what came next in our adventures.
Psynergy, in short, is a force that we can wield using the power of the mind. If you're able to resonate with one of the four elements, you can call yourself an Adept, a wielder of Psynergy.
You... you can see the Psynergy coming off of me, despite not being an Adept? That's amazing, Ms. Sucrose! You must be really special!
Ah, haha... Well, it may be on the simple side, however, there are many different forms of it. It's been this way for as long as the Ancients created the world.
I feel a similar power coming from you as well, Hu Tao. A mastery of fire?
Do you possess the ability to manipulate fire as well?
Yes, Hu Tao. We draw on it from our minds and knowledge we've gained from studying and training, and we use to create all kinds of different powers.
W-well... I, t-think about... Uh... Umm...
I didn't find out until I started studying Psynergy when I was fourteen, Yuno. You have to study and train hard to use it properly, or it may never manifest.
My hair has always been like this, Mari. Though, I can smooth them out if need be, but it looks pretty cute, don't you think?
I've been great, Mia! Now that things have settled down a little, I've finally had the time to travel at my pace!
It has been some time, huh? After all that's happened, I've been better than ever!
Eh? Isaac is doing fine, and he's still helping settle in Kalay, but why are you asking about him?
